snippet.title: The Zium Gallery (2022) - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The Zium Gallery (2022) is now available at: 
https://theziumsociety.itch.io/the-zium-gallery
https://theziumsociety.itch.io/the-zium-gallery
https://theziumsociety.itch.io/the-zium-gallery
https://theziumsociety.itch.io/the-zium-gallery
https://theziumsociety.itch.io/the-zium-gallery
https://theziumsociety.itch.io/the-zium-gallery
https://theziumsociety.itch.io/the-zium-gallery
https://theziumsociety.itch.io/the-zium-gallery

------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Zium Gallery (2022) is a Museum Exploration Game filled with artwork and installations from artists around the world, working in various mediums and styles.

Featured Artists:
Freya Berkhout, Michael Berto, Bob Bicknell-Knight, Pol Clarissou, Joost Eggermont, Evangeline Gallagher, Julián Palacios Gechtman, Cat Graffam, Freya Holmér, Matthew Keff, Most Ancient, Julia Kim, GP Lackey, LaumeB, Eric Lefaure, Niki Long, Titouan Millet, Muuutsch, Cameron Nelson, Seth Redd, Skinless Lizard, Phoebe Shalloway, Quinn Spence and Richard Walsh.

Credits:

Created, Curated and Developed by: Michael Berto
Modular Gallery Pieces: Quinn Spence
UI Art: Most Ancient
First Person Exploration Kit: Richard Walsh
Generative Audio System "AudioLoom": Michael Berto , Titouan Millet.
Additional Programming Support: Julián Palacios Gechtman, Joost Eggermont, Titouan Millet, Richard Walsh.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Every artist involved with The Zium Gallery was a gracious tester and collaborator throughout the process. The work on display belongs to the artists who created and submitted the pieces  for collection and display, humbly with  The Zium Project.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
The Zium is a self-funded project.
If you enjoy The Zium Gallery, please consider donating
when downloading The Zium Gallery.

Donate via itch.io by purchasing The Zium Gallery via Pay-What-You-Want. Every donation above $5 will receive The Founder's Gallery, a small gallery of work by The Zium Society founder Michael Berto. You will also have access to The Zium Gallery OST comprised of five long-form recordings of the endless compositions inside the gallery.

https://theziumsociety.itch.io/the-zium-gallery
https://theziumsociety.itch.io/the-zium-gallery
https://theziumsociety.itch.io/the-zium-gallery
https://theziumsociety.itch.io/the-zium-gallery
https://theziumsociety.itch.io/the-zium-gallery
https://theziumsociety.itch.io/the-zium-gallery
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
